Other Pancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors (Islet Cell Tumors)
		                    For VIPoma, treatment may include the following:         -  Fluids and hormone therapy to replace fluids and electrolytes that have been lost from the body.    -  Surgery to remove the tumor and nearby lymph nodes.    - Surgery to remove as much of the tumor as possible when the tumor cannot be completely removed or has spread to distant parts of the body.
